14
15#include <config.h>
16
17#include <isc/os.h>
18
19
20#ifdef HAVE_SYSCONF
21
22#include <unistd.h>
23
24static inline long
25sysconf_ncpus(void) {
26#if defined(_SC_NPROCESSORS_ONLN)
27 return sysconf((_SC_NPROCESSORS_ONLN));
28#elif defined(_SC_NPROC_ONLN)
29 return sysconf((_SC_NPROC_ONLN));
30#else
31 return (0);
32#endif
33}
34#endif /* HAVE_SYSCONF */
35
36#if defined(HAVE_SYS_SYSCTL_H) && defined(HAVE_SYSCTLBYNAME)
37#include <sys/types.h> /* for FreeBSD */
38#include <sys/param.h> /* for NetBSD */
39#include <sys/sysctl.h>
40
41static int
42sysctl_ncpus(void) {
43 int ncpu, result;
44 size_t len;
45
46 len = sizeof(ncpu);
47 result = sysctlbyname("hw.ncpu", &ncpu, &len , 0, 0);
48 if (result != -1)
49 return (ncpu);
50 return (0);
51}
52#endif
53
54unsigned int
55isc_os_ncpus(void) {
56 long ncpus = 0;
57
58#if defined(HAVE_SYSCONF)
59 ncpus = sysconf_ncpus();
60#endif
61#if defined(HAVE_SYS_SYSCTL_H) && defined(HAVE_SYSCTLBYNAME)
62 if (ncpus <= 0)
63 ncpus = sysctl_ncpus();
64#endif
65 if (ncpus <= 0)
66 ncpus = 1;
67
68 return ((unsigned int)ncpus);
69}
70
